name: land already in use, annual cropland to annual crop | land tenure, arable land, measured as carbon net primary productivity, annual crop | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/15486/documentation

This dataset represents the interventions associated with the provision of 1 kg NPP (Net Primary Productivity of a given land, in kg C / m2 and year) by land that is already in use as arable land. NPP values are parameterized and reported by Haberl et al. (2007)

Starts with the land already in use.

The dataset includes all interventions associated with the provision of 1 kg NPP0 from land already in use.
This activity ends with the provision of arable land tenure, measured in unit kg carbon Potential Net Primary Production (NPP).
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/016:Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities/0161:Support activities for crop production

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This activity ends with the provision of arable land tenure, measured in unit kg carbon Potential Net Primary Production (NPP0)
processDocumentation.samplingDescription:
Literature value: Taken from Haberl (2010). Refers to the amount of NPP0 measured in kg carbon extracted from existing arable land.
This dataset has been extrapolated from year 2009 to the year of the calculation (2013). The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
For further information see WFLDB Methodological Guidelines for the Life Cycle Inventory of Agricultural Products version 3.0, available at: (Report section: https://v30.ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/File/Reports).

exchanges.description: Yield = 1.0 kg/haLand that is made available for the cultivation of annual crops, expressed in kg carbon net pripary productivity
